name: Gold Star Canyon
description:
Gold Star Canyon is a fun and quick canyon scramble. Easy yet still fun enough to make it worthwhile. Trailhead is pull-off on South Broadway Road. Trailhead sign with information about hike up to canyon is available. No restrooms. Trailhead is at 39.0907,-108.6900.

Approach

From trailhead follow obvious trail up to top on canyon staying west of canyon. Once at top of main canyon drainage, 39.0833, -108.6968.

Descent

Follow canyon down with a few fun downclimbs until canyon opens up and return to trailhead.

Exit

Red tape

None.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
